item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 22, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Who needs a sneaker bot when AI can hallucinate a win for you? (77 points | 11 comments)
2. Apple pulls data protection tool after UK government security row (1061 points | 772 comments)
3. Start a Computer Club in the Place That You Live (49 points | 8 comments)
4. Who Wants to Work in a Factory? (18 points | 17 comments)

8. Math Academy, part 1: My eigenvector embarassment (36 points | 27 comments)

11. Show HN: Slime OS – An open-source app launcher for RP2040 based devices (88 points | 4 comments)
12. Reality has a surprising amount of detail (2017) (257 points | 136 comments)
13. Surface-Stable Fractal Dither on Playdate (30 points | discuss)
14. Launch HN: Massdriver (YC W22) – Self-serve cloud infra without the red tape (56 points | 44 comments)

18. Sparse Voxels Rasterization: Real-Time High-Fidelity Radiance Field Rendering (59 points | 13 comments)

20. DeepDive in everything of Llama3: revealing detailed insights and implementation (124 points | 8 comments)
21. Google Titans Model Explained: The Future of Memory-Driven AI Architectures (102 points | 26 comments)
22. Suckless.org: software that sucks less (230 points | 125 comments)
23. SVDQuant+NVFP4: 4× Smaller, 3× Faster FLUX with 16-bit Quality on Blackwell GPUs (19 points | 3 comments)
24. Train Your Own O1 Preview Model Within $450 (395 points | 61 comments)
25. Can you lose your native tongue? (2024) (43 points | 52 comments)
26. I found a backdoor into my bed (647 points | 293 comments)
27. Silver Lake Nears Deal for Stake in Intel's Altera Unit (3 points | 1 comment)
28. Posh (YC W22) Is Hiring ( | hide)
29. 20 years working on the same software product (287 points | 95 comments)
